title: Build APNI DUKAAN â€“ Local Shop Discovery App

requirements.text: Create a backend actor that stores shop profiles with fields: shopId, ownerName, shopName, category, description, address, city, phoneNumber, whatsappNumber, openingHours, imageUrl, and createdAt timestamp. Expose query functions to list all shops, filter shops by category and city, and get a single shop by ID. Expose an update function to register a new shop.

quotes: lets shop owners create digital shop profiles
Shop detail page showing shop profile information

acceptanceCriteria: Backend stores shop profile records with all specified fields
listShops() returns all registered shops
getShop(id) returns a single shop or null
searchShops(category, city) returns filtered results
registerShop() creates a new shop entry and returns its ID

requirements.text: Build a Welcome / Home screen that displays the APNI DUKAAN logo (from frontend/public/assets/generated/apni-dukaan-logo.png) prominently, the tagline 'Har Dukan Online', and two large call-to-action buttons: 'Find a Shop' (customer flow) and 'Register Your Shop' (seller flow). The screen must be mobile-first and full-viewport.

quotes: Welcome screen with APNI DUKAAN logo branding
Customer flow to find and browse local shops
Seller flow with multi-step form to create digital shop profile

acceptanceCriteria: Logo image is displayed on the welcome screen
Tagline 'Har Dukan Online' is visible below the logo
'Find a Shop' button navigates to the shop listings page
'Register Your Shop' button navigates to the seller registration flow
Screen is responsive and looks correct on mobile viewport widths

requirements.text: Build a Shop Listings page for the customer flow. It must fetch all shops from the backend and display them as cards showing shop name, category, city, and phone number. Include a search bar to filter by shop name or city, and a category filter dropdown. Each card must be tappable and navigate to the shop detail page.

quotes: Customer flow to find and browse local shops

acceptanceCriteria: All registered shops are listed as cards
Search bar filters cards by shop name or city in real time
Category dropdown filters the list by selected category
Tapping a card navigates to the corresponding shop detail page
Empty state message shown when no shops match the filter

requirements.text: Build a Shop Detail page that displays the full profile of a single shop: shop name, owner name, category, description, address, city, phone number (tappable tel: link), WhatsApp number (tappable wa.me link), opening hours, and shop image. Include a back button to return to the listings page.

quotes: Shop detail page showing shop profile information

acceptanceCriteria: All shop profile fields are displayed on the detail page
Phone number renders as a tappable tel: link
WhatsApp number renders as a tappable wa.me link
Back button returns the user to the shop listings page
Page handles missing optional fields gracefully

requirements.text: Build a multi-step Seller Registration form (minimum 3 steps) for shop owners to create their digital shop profile. Step 1: Basic Info (owner name, shop name, category selection). Step 2: Location & Contact (address, city, phone number, WhatsApp number, opening hours). Step 3: Description & Review (shop description, review all entered details). On final submission, call the backend registerShop() function and show a success confirmation screen with the generated shop ID.

quotes: Seller flow with multi-step form to create digital shop profile

acceptanceCriteria: Form is split into at least 3 distinct steps with a progress indicator
User can navigate back to previous steps without losing data
Each step validates required fields before proceeding
Step 3 shows a summary of all entered information for review
On submission, registerShop() is called on the backend
Success screen displays a confirmation message and the new shop ID

requirements.text: Apply a consistent visual theme across the entire app derived from the APNI DUKAAN logo: primary green (#2EBD59 range) and primary blue (#1A56B0 range) color palette, clean white backgrounds, bold sans-serif typography, rounded card components, and a mobile-first layout with a sticky bottom navigation or header showing the logo on inner pages.
acceptanceCriteria: Green and blue brand colors are used consistently for buttons, headings, and accents
All pages use white or very light backgrounds with clean spacing
Cards and buttons have rounded corners matching the brand style
Logo appears in the header or navigation on all inner pages
App is usable and visually coherent on a 375px wide mobile screen

constraints: All user-facing text must be in English
App must be mobile-first; all pages must be fully usable on 375px viewport width
Logo image must be served from frontend/public/assets/generated/ as a static asset
nonGoals: User authentication or Internet Identity login
Real-time chat between customers and shop owners
Image upload by sellers (image URL field only)

required: APNI DUKAAN brand logo: shopping cart icon with a green house silhouette rising above it, a blue and green orbital swoosh wrapping around the cart, a 4-point star sparkle accent top-right, bold text 'APNI' in green and 'DUKAAN' in blue below the icon, subtitle 'Har Dukan Online' in green with short horizontal dashes on each side, white background (apni-dukaan-logo.dim_512x512.png)
